metadata.name: Suspicious File Downloaded From File-Sharing Website Via Certutil.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of certutil with certain flags that allow the utility to download files from file-sharing websites.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\certutil.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('certutil.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('urlcache ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('verifyctl '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.githubusercontent.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('anonfiles.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cdn.discordapp.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ddns.net')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dl.dropboxusercontent.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ghostbin.co')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('glitch.me')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gofile.io')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hastebin.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mediafire.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mega.nz')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('onrender.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pages.dev')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('paste.ee')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pastebin.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pastebin.pl')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pastetext.net')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('privatlab.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('privatlab.net')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('send.exploit.in')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sendspace.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('storage.googleapis.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('storjshare.io')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('supabase.co')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('temp.sh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('transfer.sh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('trycloudflare.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ufile.io')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('w3spaces.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('workers.dev'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of certutil with certain flags that allow the utility to download files from file-sharing websites.
